channel.title: Scratch
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://info.scratch.mit.edu/sites/infoscratch.media.mit.edu/files/image/logo2modify.png[/img] [/center]
[b][u]What is Scratch?[/u][/b] Scratch is a programming language that makes it easy to create your own interactive stories, animations, games, music, and art -- and share your creations on the web. It is basically a drag and drop Java-like program. Why do I say it is like Java? I say that because there is if statements, declaring, loops, and so on. Scratch was written in a language called Squeak.
[b][u]Inside of Scratch[/u][/b] Scratch's commands are branched into 8 categories:
[ul][li]Motion[/li][/ul]
Move x steps Turn clockwise x degrees Turn counter-clockwise x degrees Point in direction x Point towards (object) Go to X:x Y:x Go to (object) Glide x secs to X:x Y:x Change X by x Change Y by x Set Y to x If on edge, bounce
[ul][li]Control[/li][/ul]
When [flag] Clicked When (key) key pressed When (sprite) clicked Wait x secs Forever Repeat x Broadcast x Broadcast x and wait When I receive x Forever if x If x If x Else Wait Until x Repeat Until x
[ul][li]Looks[/li] [li]Sensing[/li] [li]Sound[/li] [li]Operators[/li] [li]Pen[/li] [li]Variables[/li][/ul]
[b][u]Scratch Made Projects[/u][/b] You can find shit tons of Scratch projects here to give you an idea of what people can make with this. http://scratch.mit.edu/latest/shared
[b][u]Download Scratch![/u][/b] [url=http://scratch.mit.edu/]Click Here[/url]
I will be updating this more. I just woke up so IDK what to write.

item.title: Scratch
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

wow you faggots are retarded. scratch was made to educate kids, just goddamn look at it; it’s drag and drop with a gui that appeals to a prepubescent and advertises itself with a picture of a cat that reminds me of pedobear.

edit:

Why do I say it is like Java? I say that because there is if statements, declaring, loops, and so on.
are you dumb, if a language doesn't have conditionals, declarations and a way of looping (iterative constructs, recursion blah) of some sort then it really isn't worth much.

Read full topic

item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[center]

[/center]

What is Scratch?
Scratch is a programming language that makes it easy to create your own interactive stories, animations, games, music, and art – and share your creations on the web. It is basically a drag and drop Java-like program. Why do I say it is like Java? I say that because there is if statements, declaring, loops, and so on. Scratch was written in a language called Squeak.

Inside of Scratch
Scratch’s commands are branched into 8 categories:

[ul][li]Motion[/li][/ul]

Move x steps
Turn clockwise x degrees
Turn counter-clockwise x degrees
Point in direction x
Point towards (object)
Go to X:x Y:x
Go to (object)
Glide x secs to X:x Y:x
Change X by x
Change Y by x
Set Y to x
If on edge, bounce

[ul][li]Control[/li][/ul]

When [flag] Clicked
When (key) key pressed
When (sprite) clicked
Wait x secs
Forever
Repeat x
Broadcast x
Broadcast x and wait
When I receive x
Forever if x
If x
If x Else
Wait Until x
Repeat Until x

[ul][li]Looks[/li]
[li]Sensing[/li]
[li]Sound[/li]
[li]Operators[/li]
[li]Pen[/li]
[li]Variables[/li][/ul]

Scratch Made Projects
You can find shit tons of Scratch projects here to give you an idea of what people can make with this.
http://scratch.mit.edu/latest/shared
